set.xpath: //item[starts-with(@name, 'gun') or starts-with(@name, 'melee') or starts-with(@name, 'tool') or starts-with(@name, 'bow') or starts-with(@name, 'crossbow')]/effect_group/passive_effect[@name='EntityDamage']/@value

//item[starts-with(@name, 'gun') or starts-with(@name, 'melee') or starts-with(@name, 'tool') or starts-with(@name, 'bow') or starts-with(@name, 'crossbow')]/effect_group/passive_effect[@name='BlockDamage']/@value

//item[starts-with(@name, 'armor') or starts-with(@name, 'gun') or starts-with(@name, 'melee') or starts-with(@name, 'tool') or starts-with(@name, 'bow') or starts-with(@name, 'crossbow')]/effect_group/passive_effect[@name='DegradationMax']/@value
